T02TD1635E:254b-1: shr'i buddha t'a ki n'i s'a dha nam /
T02TD1635E:254b-3: dpal sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1635E:254b-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1635E:254b-5: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1635E:254b-6: dur khrod la sogs par gnas la /
T02TD1635E:254b-7: sngar langs te phyi nang gi khrus byas la mchod pa la sogs bshams la //
T02TD1635E:254b-9: rang gi snying gar nyi ma la aam bsams la ;
T02TD1635E:254b-10: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul nas bar snang la bsams la /
T02TD1635E:254b-11: mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang //
T02TD1635E:254b-12: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD1635E:254b-13: bdag gis sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags pa dang bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD1635E:254b-14: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02TD1635E:254b-15: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1635E:254b-16: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1635E:254b-18: bdag gi dngos po dbul ba dang /
T02TD1635E:254b-19: bstod pa la sogs pa byas te gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1635E:254b-20: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1635E:254b-21: zhes pas stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1635E:254b-22: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo dur khrod dang bcas pa bsgom par bya ste //
T02TD1635E:254b-23: der padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa bsams la //
T02TD1635E:254b-24: de'i lte bar aom dang bcas pa'i thig le bltas la /
T02TD1635E:255a-0: @255a * // de las phyogs bzhir nyi ma'i steng du thig le bzhi spros pa las lha mo bzhi bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-1: shar phyogs kyi lha mo ni sku mdog sngon mo zhal bzhi pa ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-2: sngon mo dang ser ba dang /
T02TD1635E:255a-5: phyag bzhi pa ste rdo rje dang kha t'am ga / dril bu dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1635E:255a-6: lho phyogs kyi lha mo ni sku mdog ser mo //
T02TD1635E:255a-10: ljang gu'i zhal bzhi ba phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-12: tri sh'u la ba dan dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1635E:255a-13: thod pa dang ce spyang bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1635E:255a-14: nub kyi lha mo ni sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD1635E:255a-18: ljang gu'i zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-19: sna tshogs padma dang mda' dang /
T02TD1635E:255a-22: byang gi lha mo ni mdog ljang gu /
T02TD1635E:255a-26: sngon po'i zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-31: lha mo thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02TD1635E:255a-32: skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba /
T02TD1635E:255a-33: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD1635E:255a-34: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD1635E:255a-35: mi mgo lnga bcus brgyan pa /
T02TD1635E:255a-36: nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pas brgyan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255a-37: de nas lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul bar bya ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-38: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sku mdog dmar mo //
T02TD1635E:255a-42: ljang gu'i zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-44: gzhu dang kha tv'am ga bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1635E:255a-45: de nas skye mched byin gyis brlabs ba dang /
T02TD1635E:255a-46: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa la /
T02TD1635E:255a-47: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la /
T02TD1635E:255a-48: bgegs bskrad la mchod pa rnams phul te /
T02TD1635E:255a-53: dbang du byas te dbyer med par bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255a-54: de nas sa bon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs la /
T02TD1635E:255a-55: mchod de gsol ba btab pas dbang bskur te /
T02TD1635E:255a-56: rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1635E:255a-57: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa go rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255a-58: de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-0: bstod @255b pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-1: de nas gnas bzhir 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-2: de la yi ge rnams dgod pa dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-4: rang gi 'khor lo bsreg pa dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi bzhu btul bya ba dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-6: rang gi gnas bzhir bde ba 'pho ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-7: de nas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD1635E:255b-8: aom buddha t'a ki n'i a'a: hr'i: h'um /
T02TD1635E:255b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod pa dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-12: spyod lam gyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-13: bza' ba thams cad la sa bon lngas sbyang ba dang ;
T02TD1635E:255b-14: khrus byed na lha dbang bskur ltar bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-15: nyi ma phyed dang dgongs ka'i dus su dbang bskur ba la sogs pa cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-16: de nas langs nas spyod lam gyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-17: nam phyed kyi dus su yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-18: ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD1635E:255b-19: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rang gis bon la bsdus te /
T02TD1635E:255b-20: snang stong dbyer med byang chub kyi sems su myos par byas la mnyam par bya'o / de ltar nyin dang mtshan du dngos grub kyi mtshan ma nye bar thob pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1635E:255b-21: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub gzhung gi //
T02TD1635E:255b-23: bdag gis dad pas byas pa la //
T02TD1635E:255b-24: mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1635E:255b-25: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1635E:255b-26: byas las bsod nams gang skyes las //
T02TD1635E:255b-27: bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams //
T02TD1635E:255b-28: rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa thob shog / sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
